Traits.Name: Shelter
Traits.Description: Adjacent allies get +1 accuracy on saves.

Interrupts.Name: Counter Curse
Interrupts.Description: The Incanter or an ally in range 3 gains evasion against an incoming magic attack.

Actions.Name: Autocure
Actions.Description: May grant vigor 1 to a bloodied ally in range 3.

Actions.Name: Smite
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage and character is blighted.

Actions.Name: Punishment
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or become staggered. I already staggered, the become slow.

Actions.Name: Incantation of Protection
Actions.Description: Allies in range 3 gain +1 boon on attacks and either magic evasion, sturdy, or true strike (choose one, each one replaces the last each time this stance is chosen). These effects do not apply to the incanter.
